makina kuphunzira: Ma algorithms omwe amathandizira makompyuta kuphunzira kuchokera ku data
neural network: Makina apakompyuta owuziridwa ndi kapangidwe ka ubongo
kuphunzira mozama: Amagwiritsa ntchito ma neural network amitundu yambiri pazinthu zovuta
nlp: Imathandiza makompyuta kumvetsetsa ndi kukonza chinenero cha anthu
kulimbikitsa maphunziro: Kuphunzira kupyolera mu mayesero ndi zolakwika ndi mphotho ndi zilango
maphunziro oyang'aniridwa: Kuphunzira kuchokera ku data yolembedwa yokhala ndi zotulutsa
maphunziro osayang'aniridwa: Kupeza mawonekedwe mu data popanda zilembo zofotokozedweratu
migodi deta: Kupeza mawonekedwe m'ma dataset akuluakulu komanso ovuta
katswiri dongosolo: Imatsanzira luso lopanga zisankho la katswiri wamunthu
kufufuza algorithm: Mwanjira amafufuza malo amavuto kuti apeze yankho
chidziwitso choyimira: Momwe chidziwitso chimakonzedwera ndikusungidwa ku machitidwe a AI
robotics: Munda wokhudzana ndi mapangidwe, kupanga, ndi kugwiritsa ntchito maloboti
chatbot: Pulogalamu ya pakompyuta yomwe imayerekezera kucheza ndi munthu
agi: Hypothetical AI yokhala ndi luntha lamunthu pazantchito zambiri
genetic algorithm: Njira yofufuzira motsogozedwa ndi kusinthika kwachilengedwe
mtengo wa chisankho: Chitsanzo chonga mtengo chogawa deta potengera mawonekedwe
makina othandizira vekitala: Algorithm kuti mupeze mzere kapena ma hyperplane omwe amalekanitsa bwino deta
netiweki ya bayesian: Probabilistic model yomwe imayimira mgwirizano pakati pa zosintha
logic yovuta: Imachita ndi kulingalira mongoyerekeza osati kulondola
kubadwa kwa chilankhulo chachilengedwe: Kupanga mawu ofanana ndi anthu kuchokera ku data yosanjidwa
kusanthula maganizo: Kuzindikira kamvekedwe ka mawu kapena cholinga chakumbuyo kwa mawu
kuzindikira zithunzi: Kuzindikira zinthu kapena mawonekedwe mkati mwazithunzi
kuzindikira nkhope: Tekinoloje ya biometric yomwe imazindikiritsa anthu ndi mawonekedwe a nkhope
galimoto yodziyimira payokha: Magalimoto omwe amatha kuzindikira malo awo ndikuyenda popanda kulowetsamo anthu
makina omasulira: Kumasulira kwamawu kuchokera kuchilankhulo kupita ku china
recommender system: Imaneneratu zokonda za wogwiritsa ntchito popereka malingaliro pazinthu kapena zomwe zili
mdani chitsanzo: Zolemba zopangidwira kupusitsa makina ophunzirira makina
kusamutsa maphunziro: Kugwiritsanso ntchito chidziwitso cha ntchito imodzi kuti mupititse patsogolo kuphunzira pa ina
generative model: Mtundu wa AI wokhoza kupanga deta yatsopano yofanana ndi maphunziro ake
AI yophiphiritsa: AI yotengera kuwongolera zizindikiro ndi malamulo (kusiyana ndi neural network)
Multi-agent system: Kusonkhanitsa kwa othandizira a AI omwe amalumikizana m'malo ogawana
probabilistic mapulogalamu: Kugwiritsa ntchito zilankhulo zamapulogalamu kutanthauzira ma probabilistic model
neuromorphic computing: Zida zopangidwa kuti zizitengera magwiridwe antchito a biological neurons
